alert.note: Alert for Copiah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Copiah County through 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dentville, or 9 miles west of Crystal Springs, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Copiah County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
